import{DELETE_PARTY_ID,DELETE_PARTY_ID_SUCCESS,EDIT_PARTY_ID,EDIT_PARTY_ID_SUCCESS,GET_COMPANY_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID,GET_COMPANY_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID_SUCCESS,GET_DISTRICT_ON_STATE,GET_PRICELIST,GET_PRICELIST_SUCCESS,GET_PARTYTYPES,GET_PARTYTYPES_SUCCESS,GET_COMPANY,GET_COMPANY_SUCCESS,GET_ADDRESSTYPES,GET_ADDRESSTYPES_SUCCESS,GET_DISTRICT_ON_STATE_SUCCESS,GET_PARTTYPE_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID,GET_PARTTYPE_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID_SUCCESS,GET_PARTY_LIST_API,GET_PARTY_LIST_API_SUCCESS,POST_PARTY_DATA,POST_PARTY_DATA_SUCCESS,UPDATE_PARTY_ID,UPDATE_PARTY_ID_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";// get api
export var getPartyListAPI=function getPartyListAPI(){return{type:GET_PARTY_LIST_API};};export var getPartyListAPISuccess=function getPartyListAPISuccess(pages){return{type:GET_PARTY_LIST_API_SUCCESS,payload:pages};};// post api
export var postPartyData=function postPartyData(Data,id){return{type:POST_PARTY_DATA,Data:Data,id:id};};export var postPartyDataSuccess=function postPartyDataSuccess(PartySaveSuccess){return{type:POST_PARTY_DATA_SUCCESS,payload:PartySaveSuccess};};// delete api
export var deletePartyID=function deletePartyID(id){return{type:DELETE_PARTY_ID,id:id};};export var deletePartyIDSuccess=function deletePartyIDSuccess(deleteMessage){return{type:DELETE_PARTY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:deleteMessage};};// edit api
export var editPartyID=function editPartyID(id,pageMode){return{type:EDIT_PARTY_ID,id:id,pageMode:pageMode};};export var editPartyIDSuccess=function editPartyIDSuccess(editData){return{type:EDIT_PARTY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:editData};};// update api
export var updatePartyID=function updatePartyID(updateData,id){return{type:UPDATE_PARTY_ID,updateData:updateData,id:id};};export var updatePartyIDSuccess=function updatePartyIDSuccess(data){return{type:UPDATE_PARTY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:data};};// GetDistrictOnState API dependent on state api
export var getDistrictOnState=function getDistrictOnState(id){return{type:GET_DISTRICT_ON_STATE,id:id};};export var getDistrictOnStateSuccess=function getDistrictOnStateSuccess(data){return{type:GET_DISTRICT_ON_STATE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//get pricelist
export var getPriceList=function getPriceList(){return{type:GET_PRICELIST};};export var getPriceListSuccess=function getPriceListSuccess(data){return{type:GET_PRICELIST_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//get AddressType dropdown api
export var getAddressTypes=function getAddressTypes(){return{type:GET_ADDRESSTYPES};};export var getAddressTypesSuccess=function getAddressTypesSuccess(data){return{type:GET_ADDRESSTYPES_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//get PartyType dropdown api
export var getPartyTypes=function getPartyTypes(){return{type:GET_PARTYTYPES};};export var getPartyTypesSuccess=function getPartyTypesSuccess(data){return{type:GET_PARTYTYPES_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//get company dropdown api
export var getCompany=function getCompany(){return{type:GET_COMPANY};};export var getCompanySuccess=function getCompanySuccess(data){return{type:GET_COMPANY_SUCCESS,payload:data};};// GetPartyTypeByDivisionTypeID API dependent on DivisionTypes api
export var GetPartyTypeByDivisionTypeID=function GetPartyTypeByDivisionTypeID(id){return{type:GET_PARTTYPE_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID,id:id};};export var GetPartyTypeByDivisionTypeIDSuccess=function GetPartyTypeByDivisionTypeIDSuccess(data){return{type:GET_PARTTYPE_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID_SUCCESS,payload:data};};// GetCompanyByDivisionTypeID API dependent on DivisionTypes api
export var GetCompanyByDivisionTypeID=function GetCompanyByDivisionTypeID(id){return{type:GET_COMPANY_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID,id:id};};export var GetCompanyByDivisionTypeIDSuccess=function GetCompanyByDivisionTypeIDSuccess(data){return{type:GET_COMPANY_BY_DIVISIONTYPES_ID_SUCCESS,payload:data};};
